table.name: crm_custom_data_value
table.comment: Data store for each extended properties.

field.name: entity_table
field.comment: physical tablename for entity being extended by this data, e.g. crm_contact

field.name: entity_id
field.comment: FK to record in the entity table specified by entity_table column.

field.name: int_data
field.comment: stores data for ext property data_type = integer. This col supports signed integers.

field.name: float_data
field.comment: stores data for ext property data_type = float and money.

field.name: char_data
field.comment: data for ext property data_type = text.

field.name: date_data
field.comment: data for ext property data_type = date.

field.name: memo_data
field.comment: data for ext property data_type = memo.
